title: Election Results Live: Northern Ireland - BBC News
summary: alliance party 's naomi long loses east belfast seat to dup 's gavin robinson .
sinn fein 's michelle gildernew loses fermanagh and south tyrone seat to uup 's tom elliott .
dup 's willie mccrea loses south antrim seat to uup 's danny kinahan .
final results : dup : 8 ( - ) sinn fein : 4 ( -1 ) sdlp : 3 uup : 2 ( +2 ) ind : 1 alliance : 0 ( -1 ) .

documents.title: goodbye
text: that concludes the bbc elections results live from northern ireland .
evening extra will be running an election special at 17:00 this evening .
normal service on bbc news ni live will resume at 07:00 on monday .
until then you can keep up-to-date with all of the latest news , sport , travel and weather on the

documents.title: devolution delivery
text: david cameron says his party will `` govern as a party of one nation '' .
the prime minister said that devolution promised to scotland , wales and northern ireland will be delivered .

documents.title: mcnarry 'sad ' about farage resignation
text: ukip leader in northern ireland david mcnarry tells talkback that he 's `` personally sad '' that
ukip only returned one mp , douglas carswell , in clacton .
mr mcnarry said it `` was n't a disaster '' for the party .

documents.title: pm 'ca n't take uup vote for granted '
text: newly-elected fermanagh and south tyrone mp tom elliott tells william that the prime minister david cameron `` wo n't be able to take my vote for granted '' if a time comes when he needs support from smaller unionist parties .
mr elliott said he 'd be open to having discussions with mr cameron , and would negotiate `` each issue as it comes '' .
author: BBC Talkback

documents.title: villiers coy on future deals
text: northern ireland secretary of state theresa villiers said that she will not speculate on talks about any possible deals with northern ireland political parties in future .
ms villiers said : `` we 'll be governing as a conservative majority government .
we 've always as a party worked with the northern ireland political parties on matters of common interest . ''

documents.title: level pegging
text: news ni business correspondent julian o'neill
who would 've thought @ twitterid rout will leave them with same number of mps as @ twitterid on 8 ?

documents.title: lunchtime special
text: one northern ireland
this lunchtime 's extended @ twitterid is now expected on air on @ twitterid at the later time of 1405 .

documents.title: uup only ni party to make gains
text: the ulster unionists were
danny kinahan took south antrim from the dup while tom elliott ousted sinn fein 's michelle gildernew in fermanagh and south tyrone .

documents.title: alliance leader in studio
text: alliance party leader david ford is in the talkback studio and says `` the odds were always against naomi long '' in her battle to keep the party 's only westminster seat .

david ford said it was `` rather sad '' that the dup 's gavin robinson did not pay tribute to ms long in his speech after he defeated her last night and claimed mr robinson 's speech was the `` nastiest '' of all acceptance speeches across the uk .
author: BBC Talkback

documents.title: dup 's gavin robinson reflects on speech
text: newly elected mp for east belfast gavin robinson tells william that he should have reflected on the work done by outgoing mp naomi long in his speech last night .
he said the campaign has been `` not only long but very difficult '' , and that `` there should have been scope for me to recognise her contribution '' .
author: BBC Talkback

documents.title: union warns of post-election suffering
text: peter bunting , assistant general secretary of the union ictu has warned that the election results mean that the people of northern ireland will suffer more if the conservative party manifesto is implemented .

mr bunting said : `` all mps elected from northern ireland should start immediate negotiations with all of the other non-tory parties elected to westminster , especially those new mps from the other devolved parts of the uk . ''

documents.title: election special
text: missing your local election coverage ?
never fear ,
william will be speaking to several of the parties as well as gauging reaction from political commentators .
author: BBC Talkback

documents.title: deal or no deal ?
text: talkback presenter william crawley

documents.title: perfect storm
text: outgoing mp naomi long says she was the victim of a `` perfect storm '' that resulted in

she said while she was heartened by the goodwill shown to her by the public during her campaign , the dup 's `` whipping up of tensions around the union flag '' was always going make retaining her seat an `` uphill struggle '' .

documents.title: elliott takes seat
text: the dust has settled in fermanagh south tyrone and the uup 's tom elliott has emerged victorious .
in the heat of the battle , though , bbc news ni reporter louise cullen
taking it easy - tom elliott mp # ge2015 # fst

documents.title: number of ni women mps halved
text: while more women have been voted in to parliament at this election than ever before , with female mps holding almost a third of all seats , here in northern ireland the number of women mps has been halved from four to two .
lady sylvia hermon and margaret ritchie are the only two women among our 18 elected representatives , after naomi long and michelle gildernew lost their seats .

documents.title: sinn fein loss has knock-on effect
text: ni 's conor spackman
because sf lost a seat the virtual majority ( excluding speaker ) is now really more 324 than 323

documents.title: votes for dead candidate
text: belfast-born ronnie carroll , who represented britain at the eurovision song contest twice in the 1960s , collected 113 votes in hampstead and kilburn in the general election - despite having died before any votes were cast .

documents.title: working for the union at westminster
text: dup leader peter robinson says that he believes that the uup and dup can `` work in the interests of the union at westminster , because the union is going to be under pressure from scottish nationalists . ''

mr robinson added : `` as a unionist i obviously want to see the interests of the united kingdom moving forward , and of course as someone from northern ireland i want to see it happening in the best interests of the people of northern ireland . ''

documents.title: ni 's post-election considerations
text: economics and business editor john campbell

documents.title: no recount required
text: the uup 's tom elliott won the fermanagh south tyrone seat , defeating sitting mp michelle gildernew with
ms gildernew 's victory in 2010 was a much tighter contest when the sinn fein representative won by just four votes .

documents.title: unionists unhappy with doherty 's speech :
text: the news letter
mr doherty 's claim that west tyrone was `` still a republican seat '' provoked a strong reaction from the dup and uup contingents .
author: News Letter

documents.title: election impact on stormont 's budget :
text: economics and business editor john campbell has
you can read the full article on
some initial thoughts on what election result means for stormont 's budget
@ twitterid think the short term is more concerning now .
there is still a serious 14/15 hangover and a huge 15/16 black hole that needs sorted
@ twitterid @ twitterid reality sinking in .
dup will hold no whip hand .
if sf took seats u might see ability to press with snp but as usual
author: John Campbell
BBC News NI Economics & Business Editor

documents.title: paisley power in north antrim :
text: ian paisley jr comfortably retained his north antrim seat with 18,107 votes .
the paisley name has been synonymous with that seat for 45 years .
author: BBC NI Archive

documents.title: ni election results at a glance
text: want to know the results of the election in northern ireland at a glance ?
say no more .
there were a total of 138 candidates in northern ireland and 1.2m people were eligible to vote .

documents.title: hermon holds on to north down :
text: lady sylvia hermon retained her seat in north down as expected , but the independent candidate 's

documents.title: durkan on mcdonnell
text: the sdlp 's mark durkan said his party leader alasdair mcdonnell had `` once again defied gravity almost in south belfast . ''

on criticism of mr mcdonnell 's voting record in the commons , he said : `` nobody could really argue that alasdair 's voting record in comparison to mine is n't related to the fact that he has a dual mandate and particularly the dual mandate and the role of party leader . ''

documents.title: gildernew calls pact an 'unholy alliance '
text: news ni reporter clodagh rice
michelle gildernew on @ twitterid now says uup 's tom elliott winning fermanagh south tyrone is down to `` an unholy alliance '' in relation to pact
@ twitterid @ twitterid did sf not want a pact with the sdlp !
so confusing
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid but blaming sdlp cause they lost their seat ?
hello hypocrisy my old friend
@ twitterid @ twitterid you need to stop blaming alliance for every little problem

documents.title: 'mood change ' responsible for kinahan victory
text: ulster unionist danny kinahan put his victory down to `` hard work and the people of south antrim putting their faith in me '' .
mr kinahan said : `` i think there was a mood here in south antrim to have someone different and a different approach to how politics is done . ''

documents.title: history repeating in south belfast :
text: the sdlp 's alasdair mcdonnell took south belfast with 9,560 votes .
it was a case of history repeating itself , as
author: BBC NI Archive

documents.title: where there 's a will there 's a way
text: news ni 's kerry thompson
a very concentrated @ twitterid who will have all the election results @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid # ge2015
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid you little tinker !
i never even noticed you !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid a sign of a hard worker !

documents.title: unionist pact 'successful '
text: stormont finance minister simon hamilton has hailed the impact of the unionist pact in four constituencies across northern ireland .
mr hamilton said : `` the pact has been successful in that it has increased unionist representation in the house of commons by two seats . ''

documents.title: ni election night recap
text: for those of you just waking up , here 's a short video that tells the story of

sinn fein has lost fermanagh and south tyrone to the ulster unionists , the dup 's gavin robinson has ousted naomi long from east belfast and danny kinahan of the uup has taken south antrim from the dup .

documents.title: kinahan 's pop connections
text: the uup 's danny kinahan has taken south antrim , a seat that had been held by the dup 's willie mccrea since 2005 .
an interesting fact about south antrim 's newly elected mp ?
his cousin is none other than chris de burgh .
kinahan will be making regular trips across the water to westminster now - let 's hope he remembers to pay the ferryman .

documents.title: agnew happy with increase in vote
text: despite not winning any seats , green party leader stephen agnew says that he is happy with the increase in his party 's vote .
mr agnew said : `` deputy leader clare bailey took a 5.7 % share of the vote , up 2.7 % since 2010 .
this bodes well for next year 's assembly elections and we have confidence that south belfast will see a green mla . ''

documents.title: northern irishman loses scottish seat
text: political correspondent stephen walker
ni born lib dem michael moore loses seat to snp in berwickshire. # ge2015

documents.title: nesbitt : positive message for unionism
text: mike nesbitt says that tom elliott 's win for the the uup in fermanagh south tyrone was a victory for unionism .

mr nesbitt said : `` after the local government election last year i took my blank page for this campaign and what i wanted at number one was to win back for unionism off sinn fein the most westerly constituency in the united kingdom , because that sends out a massive positive message to unionism . ''

documents.title: the lie of the land
text: it 's now officially the morning after the night before so here 's
the ulster unionists now have two mps , after taking south antrim from the dup .
elsewhere , it 's as you were .

documents.title: plenty more to come
text: that 's it for the overnight bbc news ni live team - we 're off home for some sleep , but that ai n't the end of our coverage .
our live page continues on until 14:00 and will have all the latest reaction and analysis from an eventful night of political intrigue .
thanks for joining us .
author: Ciaran McCauley
BBC News NI

documents.title: archive : beat the bookie ?
text: it 's not just politicians looking on anxiously tonight - bookies have a lot riding on the results too .
in this

documents.title: tories close in on a majority
text: this has proved to be one of the most dramatic elections in recent memory .
as the results continue to pour in , the conservatives and the snp are the winners with labour and the lib dems the losers .
the full of how the political map of the uk has changed should be known by this afternoon .
author: Stephen Walker
BBC News NI Political Correspondent

documents.title: night and day
text: is it a new dawn in northern ireland 's political landscape ?

that 's for others to say but the difference in the bbc ni newsroom from last night can be measured by the discarded junk food wrappers , empty coffee cups and more-caffeinated-than-usual journalists hoping for sleep .

documents.title: uup in the mud ?
text: the irish news
the uup is going to mud wrestle to decide who 's the assembly group leader - @ twitterid said it , not us # ge2015ni
@ twitterid @ twitterid the snake in the grass
author: Irish News

documents.title: mid ulstermccrea is 'on the run '
text: sinn fein mp for mid ulster francie molloy celebrating earlier with party colleagues ian milne mla and stormont agriculture minister michelle o'neill .
in his speech , mr molloy said : `` this constituency changed dramatically when martin mcguinness first defeated willie mccrea and i understand that willie is on the run again .
`` another constituency has said time to move on so i will send him a letter to explain what it 's all about . ''

documents.title: finishing line edges up
text: with sinn fein losing fermanagh and south tyrone , that changes the wider uk slightly .
the finishing line - the total number of seats needed for an effective majority - now increases by one , to 324 , from the last parliament because the number of abstaining mps has fallen .

documents.title: fermanagh south tyroneall over in omagh
text: all done and dusted .
author: Louise Cullen
BBC NI News

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyronegildernew 'will be back '
text: `` i have no doubt she will be back , '' says martin mcguinness of michelle gildernew .
author: Louise Cullen
BBC NI News

documents.title: final score
text: here 's how the 18 seats divide up among the parties .
dup : 8
sinn fein : 4
sdlp : 3
uup : 2
independent : 1

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyronesun 's up
text: just realised it 's light outside .
now it 's all over in omagh it could be time for a dip before breakfast .
author: Julian Fowler
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh south tyrone'margin too great ' for recount
text: it was a 530 majority for tom elliott .
he says sinn fein asked for a recount and the returning officer decided not to `` because the margin was too great '' .
on a westminster deal , mike nesbitt , who was at the count centre in omagh , said the party certainly will not be rushing to sit down with the dup .

documents.title: all declarations done
text: that 's it - all votes have been counted , biscuits munched , coffee glugged and we have northern ireland 's 18 mps .
the dup loses a seat in south antrim , but gains east belfast ; alliance loses its only mp in naomi long ; sinn fein loses fermanagh and south tyrone ; and the uup goes from zero mps to two .
author: Ciaran McCauley
BBC News NI

documents.title: mid ulsterall done
text: they 're all done in mid ulster .
author: Catherine Smyth
BBC News NI

documents.title: mid ulsterearly morning interview
text: reporter natalie lindo speaks to the newly returned sinn fein mp for mid ulster francie molloy .
author: Catherine Smyth
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyrone'mountains to climb '
text: `` issues to fight , mountains to climb , '' says michelle gildernew , leaving the omagh count .
author: Louise Cullen
BBC NI News

documents.title: fermanagh south tyronesinn fein bows out
text: michelle gildernew thanks the `` thousands of people '' ( 23,078 ) who voted for sinn fein : `` i believe that vote represents people of all faiths and none and i am proud and humbled to have been chosen by those people in fermanagh south tyrone . ''

documents.title: newry/ armagh'endorsement of equality over austerity '
text: mickey brady tweets , straight after winning the newry and armagh seat :

documents.title: newry and armaghbrady : i 'm proud to replace murphy
text: mickey brady , the new sinn fein mp for newry and armagh keeps it short and sweet in his victory speech .
`` we have won with an increased vote .
i am replacing conor murphy , i am so proud to do that and i will carry on the good work .
`` on a personal level , it 's a bit of history . ''

documents.title: newry and armaghresult
text: newry and armaghresult

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyrone'not a green constituency '
text: the ulster unionist tom elliott looks delighted to have taken fermanagh and south tyrone from sinn fein .
he says : `` this is not a green constituency .
it does n't belong to bobby sands .
`` it belongs to the people of fermanagh and south tyrone and that is who i intend to represent . ''

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyroneno recount allowed
text: sinn fein asked for a recount but was refused says michelle gildernew .
author: Julian Fowler
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyroneanother close fight
text: another nail-biting finish , less than one per cent , says michelle gildernew .
she thanks sinn fein voters .
author: Julian Fowler
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh south tyroneresult
text: fermanagh south tyroneresult

documents.title: newry and armaghthe numbers
text: mickey brady , sinn fein 20,488
danny kennedy , uup - 16,312
justin mcnulty , sdlp - 12,026
kate nicholl , alliance party - 841
robert rigby , conservative party - 210

documents.title: fermanagh and south tyroneelliott : this has been a combined effort
text: fermanagh and south tyrone was one of the unionist pact constituencies , and after his victory there tom elliott said : `` it just shows you what you can do when there is a combined effort . ''
`` the dup , the tuv , ukip , the victims ' sector , the loyal orders and from right across the spectrum - i thank those people who realised we need representation in fermanagh and south tyrone . ''

documents.title: breakingnewry & armaghbrady retains seat
text: mickey brady is elected in

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyroneunionist jubilation
text: jubilation in omagh where tom elliott has deposed michelle gildernew - she 's held the seat since 2001 .
that 's the result of the night .

documents.title: newry & armaghsit down , stand up
text: it 's been a great night for the snp who have swept all before them in scotland - it 's even led reporter rick faragher to declare he 's afraid to stand up in case they take his seat too .

documents.title: ni secretary back in
text: over in great britain , northern ireland secretary theresa villiers holds her seat in chipping barnet .

documents.title: ni man wins merseyside seat
text: conor mcginn from armagh has won the st helens north seat for labour in the north west of england .
his father pat was a sinn fein councillor .
conor has been an advisor to vernon coaker , a former shadow secretary of state for northern ireland .

documents.title: newry & armaghturnout declared
text: 50,276 votes cast in newry-armagh : 64.76 % turnout .
author: Rick Faragher
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh & south tyroneelliott celebrating
text: a big cheer has just gone up - tom elliott is celebrating victory here .
author: Julian Fowler
BBC News NI

documents.title: nearly there
text: just .
two .
results .
to go .
so far the night of the long election has seen naomi long and william mccrea lose their seats .
could michelle gildernew in fermanagh & south tyrone be about to follow suit ?
we 're waiting for that result and newry & armagh .
author: Ciaran McCauley
BBC News NI

documents.title: fermanagh south tyroneelliot victory ?
text: the information that i 've been given is that tom elliot is 200 votes ahead - maybe even 300 .
we are still waiting for the official result here but it looks like tom elliot may just have done it .
author: Julian Fowler
BBC News NI

documents.title: east londonderryit 's all over
text: if you happen to be asleep or something ridiculous , here are the final figures for east londonderry .
dawn chorus !
author: Sean O'Halloran
BBC News NI

documents.title: newry & armaghhold the phone ?
text: uup 's danny kennedy at the newry & armagh count .
author: Rick Faragher
BBC News NI

documents.title: south downvictory 'because sdlp represent constituents '
text: margaret ritchie tells maggie taggart that her victory in south down was down to the sdlp representing their constituents in the house of commons .
it 's a reference to sinn fein , who have an abstentionist policy and do n't take their seats .
author: Chris Thornton
BBC News NI

documents.title: dup leader looking ahead :
text: peter robinson is openly talking about what role the dup could play in supporting a government .
author: Chris Buckler
BBC Ireland Correspondent

documents.title: newry & armaghbrady set for win
text: getting close to a result in newry & armagh .
checking ineligible votes .
all parties agree mickey brady - as expected - set for comfy win .
author: Gordon Adair
BBC News NI
